comment: Nov 11: Alexander-Walker (back) won't play in Monday's game against the Clippers, Brad Rowland of the Locked On Podcast Network reports.

Sep 30: Strus (foot) is no longer wearing a walking boot on Tuesday, but still has a lengthy recovery process ahead, Chris Fedor of The Cleveland Plain Dealer reports.

Nov 11: Flagg stated after Monday's 116-114 loss to the Bucks that he suffered a right thumb sprain during one of the final plays of the game, Noah Weber of TheSmokingCuban.com reports. He finished with 26 points (9-15 FG, 1-5 3Pt, 7-10 FT), nine rebounds, four assists, two steals and one block in 35 minutes.
Nov 10: Exum (knee) still does not have an official timetable to return.

Nov 10: Peter (groin) is listed as questionable for Tuesday's game against the Jazz.

Nov 8: Mathurin (toe) has been ruled out for Saturday's game against the Nuggets.
Nov 5: Furphy is set to miss at least the next five games for the Pacers, Alex Golden of the 'Setting the Pace' podcast reports.
